name: Square: Simple Light Race
description:
FEATURES:

- stunning visual and sound effects
- infinity count of levels
- all for free, without donate or forcibly viewing ads
- all content made by one person
- all gameplay sounds in the same as music gamma, to make some sad harmony atmosphere
- collision with the wall, or right after transformation, makes a ricochet
- leaderboards, but the game is not about leaders, the game about the feelings and depressions
- resurrection by clicking on an empty area of the level
- all parts of the levels are made in such a way as to make it possible to feel the consequences of decisions made or not made or their sequences
- the game does not ask you to pass it, the game only illustrates various mental principles
- the game wants to share the fact that you are not the only one who is sad

Post Scriptum:

This is more than "just game", more than "just unique gameplay mechanic with nice sounds and visual effects".
This is a republish of one of my early games (squarmation).
It took several months of work after the job to make it.
I spend hundreds of hours polishing and design gameplay mechanic.
Several low-budget advertising campaigns have been run. Including advertising on social networks.
After the company - there were zero downloads. And that's all. Nobody sees this game in the market. Nobody plays. And I only got one real review from a user. That download game, play, and says (in short): "the game is depressive and I'm impressed".. (or something like this).

In the hope that absolute zero in downloads is some kind of error xD
(Even if the game is the worst game ever made in-universe. Random and statistics, hello?)

And here's the question.
Will I give up? Not.
Will you give up? Not recommend. And it's not just about the game =)

This is not a standard game. Most likely this is a performance to support the "NEVER GIVE UP" principle.

This game is aimed at making money.
This game is just a creative act of sincerity with which I wanted to express some of my feelings and thoughts via visual sound effects and gameplay mechanics.

PS (once more):
Thanks if you read this.
Thanks if you play this game.
Thanks if you TRY to play xD (yeah sometimes game can be hard)
Feel free to make reviews and leave comments.

Sincerely,
Vasiliy
